episode: My husband had a job interview for a new position that was perfect for him. I was very hopeful that they would hire him!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My husband had a job interview last week. I really hope they pick him for this position!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed for him! What's the job for?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is field interviewer on a survey project. It's something he's good at and enjoys doing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a great fit, then. When will you know the results?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We're hoping to find out by the end of this week. It's so hard to wait patiently!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The waiting can be agonizing. Keeping my fingers crossed for good news!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you so much for your positive vibes! He feels good about how the interview went but does not know how many others they are also considering.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Competition can be tough. Hopefully, his confidence will pay off.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He definitely has the experience they are looking for, so that is helpful.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a big plus! Experience can make a big difference.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We're really hoping so! Plus, he seemed to get along well with the person that interviewed him. He said they had a good rapport.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good rapport can go a long way, that's a good sign!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: All signs are pointing towards yay, but until we hear for sure, I am on pins and needles and just hoping for the best!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine! Stay positive, you'll get the news soon!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How do I distract myself in the meantime? Any ideas?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Try to stay busy with activities you enjoy, or take your mind off it with a good book or movie.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Oh, reading is a great idea. Can you recommend a good book?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm not picky, what genre do you like?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I like historical mysteries.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Historical mysteries are great! Have you read any of the Maisie Dobbs series?
